row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "User Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test Set Folder Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test Set Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sync Mode" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_SYNC_MODE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM !------------------------------------------ Buidling arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Password Encryption/Decryption :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
:SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "TESTSET_EXECUTION" :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TEMP_ACTION_NAME# = "JOB_LAUNCHER"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 20
:IF &UC4RB_HPQC_SYNC_MODE# = "Yes"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "-testsetfolderpath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-testsetname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[13] = "-hostipaddress" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_HOST_IP_ADDRESS#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[14] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[15] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[16] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
:ELSE
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TEMP_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "-testsetfolderpath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-testsetname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[13] = "-hostipaddress" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_HOST_IP_ADDRESS#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[14] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[15] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[16] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[17] = "-mainaction" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[18] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[19] = "-jarpath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[20] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_EXEC_STATUS# = "NA" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_EXEC_STATUS#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_ACTION_SPECIFIC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** TEST SET EXECUTION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** TEST SET EXECUTION ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: ! Storing and Publishing created advanced test set execution status in AE variable :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "status" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_EXEC_STATUS# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_EXEC_STATUS#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
